data.textUthmani: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] أُوحِىَ [It has been revealed] إِلَىَّ [to me] أَنَّهُ [that] ٱسْتَمَعَ [listened] نَفَرٌۭ [a group] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْجِنِّ [the jinn] فَقَالُوٓا۟ [and they said] إِنَّا [Indeed, we] سَمِعْنَا [heard] قُرْءَانًا [a Quran] عَجَبًۭا [amazing]
data.transliteration: Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAanafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAnaqur-anan AAajaba

data.textUthmani: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: يَهْدِىٓ [It guides] إِلَى [to] ٱلرُّشْدِ [the right way] فَـَٔامَنَّا [so we believe] بِهِۦ ۖ [in it] وَلَن [and never] نُّشْرِكَ [we will associate] بِرَبِّنَآ [with our Lord] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
data.transliteration: Yahdee ila arrushdi faamannabihi walan nushrika birabbina ahada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that He ] تَعَـٰلَىٰ [Exalted is] جَدُّ [(the) Majesty] رَبِّنَا [(of) our Lord ] مَا [not] ٱتَّخَذَ [He has taken] صَـٰحِبَةًۭ [a wife] وَلَا [and not] وَلَدًۭا [a son]
data.transliteration: Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbinama ittakhatha sahibatan wala walada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that he] كَانَ [used to] يَقُولُ [speak ] سَفِيهُنَا [the foolish among us] عَلَى [against] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] شَطَطًۭا [an excessive transgression]
data.transliteration: Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehunaAAala Allahi shatata

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] ظَنَنَّآ [thought] أَن [that] لَّن [never] تَقُولَ [will say] ٱلْإِنسُ [the men] وَٱلْجِنُّ [and the jinn] عَلَى [against] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] كَذِبًۭا [any lie]
data.transliteration: Waanna thanannaan lan taqoola al-insu waljinnu AAala Allahikathiba

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that] كَانَ [(there) were] رِجَالٌۭ [men] مِّنَ [among] ٱلْإِنسِ [mankind] يَعُوذُونَ [who sought refuge] بِرِجَالٍۢ [in (the) men] مِّنَ [from] ٱلْجِنِّ [the jinn] فَزَادُوهُمْ [so they increased them] رَهَقًۭا [(in) burden]
data.transliteration: Waannahu kana rijalun minaal-insi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohumrahaqa

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُمْ [And that they] ظَنُّوا۟ [thought] كَمَا [as] ظَنَنتُمْ [you thought] أَن [that] لَّن [never] يَبْعَثَ [will raise] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
data.transliteration: Waannahum thannoo kama thanantuman lan yabAAatha Allahu ahada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] لَمَسْنَا [sought to touch] ٱلسَّمَآءَ [the heaven] فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا [but we found it] مُلِئَتْ [filled (with)] حَرَسًۭا [guards] شَدِيدًۭا [severe] وَشُهُبًۭا [and flaming fires]
data.transliteration: Waanna lamasna assamaafawajadnaha muli-at harasan shadeedanwashuhuba

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] كُنَّا [used to] نَقْعُدُ [sit] مِنْهَا [there in] مَقَـٰعِدَ [positions] لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ [for hearing] فَمَن [but (he) who] يَسْتَمِعِ [listens] ٱلْـَٔانَ [now] يَجِدْ [will find] لَهُۥ [for him] شِهَابًۭا [a flaming fire] رَّصَدًۭا [waiting]
data.transliteration: Waanna kunna naqAAudu minhamaqaAAida lissamAAi faman yastamiAAi al-anayajid lahu shihaban rasada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we ] لَا [not] نَدْرِىٓ [we know] أَشَرٌّ [whether evil] أُرِيدَ [is intended] بِمَن [for (those) who] فِى [(are) in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] أَمْ [or] أَرَادَ [intends] بِهِمْ [for them] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] رَشَدًۭا [a right path]
data.transliteration: Waanna la nadree asharrunoreeda biman fee al-ardi am arada bihim rabbuhumrashada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that [we]] مِنَّا [among us] ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ [(are) the righteous] وَمِنَّا [and among us] دُونَ [(are) other than] ذَٰلِكَ ۖ [that] كُنَّا [We] طَرَآئِقَ [(are on) ways] قِدَدًۭا [different]
data.transliteration: Waanna minna assalihoonawaminna doona thalika kunna tara-iqaqidada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] ظَنَنَّآ [[we] have become certain] أَن [that] لَّن [never] نُّعْجِزَ [we will cause failure] ٱللَّهَ [(to) Allah] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَلَن [and never] نُّعْجِزَهُۥ [we can escape Him] هَرَبًۭا [(by) flight]
data.transliteration: Wanna thanannaan lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee al-ardi walan nuAAjizahuharaba

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that [we]] لَمَّا [when] سَمِعْنَا [we heard] ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ [the Guidance] ءَامَنَّا [we believed] بِهِۦ ۖ [in it] فَمَن [And whoever] يُؤْمِنۢ [believes] بِرَبِّهِۦ [in his Lord] فَلَا [then not] يَخَافُ [he will fear] بَخْسًۭا [any loss] وَلَا [and not] رَهَقًۭا [any burden]
data.transliteration: Waanna lamma samiAAnaalhuda amanna bihi faman yu/min birabbihifala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqa

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] مِنَّا [among us] ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ [(are) Muslims] وَمِنَّا [and among us] ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ [(are) unjust] فَمَنْ [And whoever] أَسْلَمَ [submits] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [then those] تَحَرَّوْا۟ [have sought] رَشَدًۭا [(the) right path]
data.transliteration: Waanna minna almuslimoonawaminna alqasitoona faman aslama faola-ikataharraw rashada

data.textUthmani: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَمَّا [And as for] ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ [the unjust] فَكَانُوا۟ [they will be] لِجَهَنَّمَ [for Hell] حَطَبًۭا [firewood]
data.transliteration: Waama alqasitoona fakanoolijahannama hataba

data.textUthmani: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَلَّوِ [And that if] ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ [they had remained] عَلَى [on] ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ [the Way] لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم [surely We (would) have given them to drink] مَّآءً [water] غَدَقًۭا [(in) abundance]
data.transliteration: Waallawi istaqamoo AAala attareeqatilaasqaynahum maan ghadaqa

words.translation: surely We (would) have given them to drink

data.textUthmani: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
data.wordByWord: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ [That We might test them] فِيهِ ۚ [therein] وَمَن [And whoever] يُعْرِضْ [turns away] عَن [from] ذِكْرِ [the Remembrance] رَبِّهِۦ [(of) his Lord] يَسْلُكْهُ [He will make him enter] عَذَابًۭا [a punishment] صَعَدًۭا [severe]
data.transliteration: Linaftinahum feehi waman yuAArid AAanthikri rabbihi yasluk-hu AAathaban saAAada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّ [And that] ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ [the masjids] لِلَّهِ [(are) for Allah] فَلَا [so (do) not] تَدْعُوا۟ [call] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
data.transliteration: Waanna almasajida lillahi falatadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that] لَمَّا [when] قَامَ [stood up] عَبْدُ [(the) slave] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] يَدْعُوهُ [calling (upon) Him] كَادُوا۟ [they almost] يَكُونُونَ [became] عَلَيْهِ [around him] لِبَدًۭا [a compacted mass]
data.transliteration: Waannahu lamma qama AAabdu AllahiyadAAoohu kadoo yakoonoona AAalayhi libada

data.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَدْعُوا۟ [I call upon] رَبِّى [my Lord] وَلَآ [and not] أُشْرِكُ [I associate] بِهِۦٓ [with Him] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
data.transliteration: Qul innama adAAoo rabbee walaoshriku bihi ahada

data.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] لَآ [(do) not] أَمْلِكُ [possess] لَكُمْ [for you] ضَرًّۭا [any harm] وَلَا [and not] رَشَدًۭا [right path]
data.transliteration: Qul innee la amliku lakum darranwala rashada

data.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنِّى [Indeed I] لَن [never] يُجِيرَنِى [can protect me] مِنَ [from] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] أَحَدٌۭ [anyone] وَلَنْ [and never] أَجِدَ [can I find] مِن [from] دُونِهِۦ [besides Him] مُلْتَحَدًا [any refuge]
data.transliteration: Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahiahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahada

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [But] بَلَـٰغًۭا [(the) notification] مِّنَ [from] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ [and His Messages] وَمَن [And whoever] يَعْصِ [disobeys] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] وَرَسُولَهُۥ [and His Messenger] فَإِنَّ [then indeed] لَهُۥ [for him] نَارَ [(is the) Fire] جَهَنَّمَ [(of) Hell] خَـٰلِدِينَ [(they will) abide] فِيهَآ [therein] أَبَدًا [forever]
data.transliteration: Illa balaghan mina Allahiwarisalatihi waman yaAAsi Allahawarasoolahu fa-inna lahu nara jahannama khalideenafeeha abada

data.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
data.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] رَأَوْا۟ [they see] مَا [what] يُوعَدُونَ [they are promised] فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ [then they will know] مَنْ [who] أَضْعَفُ [(is) weaker] نَاصِرًۭا [(in) helpers] وَأَقَلُّ [and fewer] عَدَدًۭا [(in) number]
data.transliteration: Hatta itha raaw mayooAAadoona fasayaAAlamoona man adAAafu nasiranwaaqallu AAadada

data.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنْ [Not] أَدْرِىٓ [I know] أَقَرِيبٌۭ [whether is near] مَّا [what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised] أَمْ [or (whether)] يَجْعَلُ [will appoint] لَهُۥ [for it] رَبِّىٓ [my Lord] أَمَدًا [a (distant) term]
data.transliteration: Qul in adree aqareebun ma tooAAadoonaam yajAAalu lahu rabbee amada

data.textUthmani: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: عَـٰلِمُ [(The) All-Knower] ٱلْغَيْبِ [(of) the unseen] فَلَا [so not] يُظْهِرُ [He reveals] عَلَىٰ [from] غَيْبِهِۦٓ [His unseen] أَحَدًا [(to) anyone]
data.transliteration: AAalimu alghaybi fala yuthhiruAAala ghaybihi ahada

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَنِ [whom] ٱرْتَضَىٰ [He has approved] مِن [of] رَّسُولٍۢ [a Messenger] فَإِنَّهُۥ [and indeed, He] يَسْلُكُ [makes to march] مِنۢ [from] بَيْنِ [before] يَدَيْهِ [him] وَمِنْ [and from] خَلْفِهِۦ [behind him] رَصَدًۭا [a guard]
data.transliteration: Illa mani irtada min rasoolinfa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasada

data.textUthmani: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
data.wordByWord: لِّيَعْلَمَ [That He may make evident] أَن [that] قَدْ [indeed] أَبْلَغُوا۟ [they have conveyed] رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ [(the) Messages] رَبِّهِمْ [(of) their Lord] وَأَحَاطَ [and He has encompassed] بِمَا [what] لَدَيْهِمْ [(is) with them] وَأَحْصَىٰ [and He takes account] كُلَّ [(of) all] شَىْءٍ [things] عَدَدًۢا [(in) number]
data.transliteration: LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalatirabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kullashay-in AAadada
